```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(xlsx)
library(DT)
```

# Import data from study database .xlsx file

```{r, import xlsx file}
fname <- "FNIH prospective study database excluding follow-up exams.xlsx"
```

```{r}
q1 <- xlsx::read.xlsx2(file = fname, 2, startRow = 3, endRow = 169)
datatable(q1)
 
q2 <- xlsx::read.xlsx2(file = fname, 4, startRow = 3)
datatable(q2)
```
```{r}
q3$MES_index <- as.numeric(q3$MES_index)
q1$MES_Rectum <- as.numeric(q1$MES_Rectum)
```


```{r}
q3 <- q2 |>
  select(location, MES_index)
```

```{r}
q3 |> 
  mutate(sum(q1$MES_Rectum == MES_index))
```
